estimateBorrow((uint256,uint256,uint256).details: This will charge an additional 2% interest on principal if         trading in the floor.

extend(address,uint256).details: this will always transfer in reserves regardless of if there is credit available or not

getInterestForCredit(uint256,uint256).details: Interest math with full 18 decimals leads to precision issues with more         days added. We instead scale down to 1e9 to avoid this.

increasePosition(uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Will revert if unable to satisfy totalCollateral. Depending on the         current liquidity profile of the pool, certain amounts of leverage will         be impossible to achieve.

repay(address,uint256).details: Collateral returned is proportional to incoming reserves relative to         total credit position (principal and interest).

estimateBorrow((uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Estimates credit available for borrowing given user's previous         collateral, new collateral and additional days

extend(address,uint256).notice: Extends the expiry of a user's credit account by taking in reserves          and paying interest directly.

getInterestForCredit(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates interest for a given amount of credit and number of days

getNewExpiry((uint256,uint256,uint256),u.notice: Calculate new expiry and days of interest to charge of a credit account

repay(address,uint256).notice: Repay an active credit position with reserves in exchange for bTokensIn         collateral.
